name: JAMES LIU
body:
# About Me

## Introduction

![Avatar](https://raw.github.com/jamesliu96/jamesliu96.github.io/master/images/avatar.jpg)

My name is **James Liu**, a programmer, a designer and also a student from China.

I was born in 1996.

I am now studying in the [High School Affiliated to Renmin University](http://www.rdfz.cn/).

I have an cute puppy. Her name is **Furry**. (Sorry. she was _so cute_ that she ate her own photo... I have to take another later on)

## Experience

I have been studying **Computer Science** for years, attending competitions and examinations during my study.

I have the experience of **programming**.

```JavaScript
//language.<name>[0] 
// a bool value indicating if I am experienced at <name>.
//language.<name>[1]
// a numeric value indicating my first year doing <name>.

language = {
    c_cpp:       [true, 2006],
    objective_c: [true, 2011],
    java:        [true, 2011],
    python:      [true, 2012],
    ruby:        [false, 2013],
    scala:       [false, null]
}
```

**Algorithms** are always important for me.

I have been using C/C++ since when I was 10.

I developed some interesting Apps on iOS and Android. Unfortunately I am not doing it now. (Maybe I'll catch up with it after high school)

I did a project [Crypto-JS for Nodejs](https://github.com/jamesliu96/cryptojs) (first called "Krypton").

I am also doing researches about Femtosecond Imaging with my tutor [Di Wu](http://web.media.mit.edu/~d_wu/) from both Tsinghua University.

I love snakes and pythons! Here's my Python project [renren](https://github.com/jamesliu96/renren) - a Renren.com login and posting module with complete tests.

I worked on HTML5, JavaScript and CSS3 during 2009-2014.

I am a loyal JSer. **JavaScript** is my meaning of life.

My recent HTML5 game **Flappy Mario** is on [GitHub](https://github.com/jamesliu96/flappy) ([Try](http://g.jamesliu.info/flappy))

## Contact

- Personal Email: jamesliu96 [at] 163.com
- Business Email: james [at] jamesliu.info
- Sina Weibo: [@Cloudy龟](http://weibo.com/jamesliu96)
- Twitter: Cloudy Turtle [@jamesliu96](https://twitter.com/jamesliu96)
- Facebook: James Liu

Contact me if you would like to get more information.

##### Copyright © 2014 James Liu
